page.title: 11HOUSING HIGH ERCALL
page.content: In High Ercall there are two main private housing estates called Coppice Drive and Talbot Fields. There are no semi_detached houses on these estates, most are detached houses and bungalows. There is a smaller private housing estate called the Gleblands. Cleveland Avenue is a council estate of mainly semi_detached houses. In High Ercall there is also a small block of flats which is three storeys high. In the centre of the village are older houses, built out of brick like most houses in the area. The village of Roden has an estate called Marlebrook Way. These Semi_detached houses are mainly owned by the Co_operative Wholesale Society. By Anna Chebsey and Emma Martin
